raw_comment: Just a reminder for headlines.  Feature the graph’s surprise to encourage viewers to read the article.  Include only what you see in the graph.  There’s already a lot in the graph to pique readers’ interests. Finally, short is good.
ace_sentences: This is a reminder about headlines.
A headline should feature the surprise in the graph.
Featuring the surprise in the graph encourages viewers to read the article.
A headline should include only what you see in the graph.
The graph already contains a lot of information.
The information in the graph can pique the interests of readers.
